ABOUT

Nestled at the crossroads of melody and flavor, Brass Stack Jack's was born from a riff that went a bit off the beaten path. It all started when Jack, a saxophone virtuoso whose tunes could seduce the moon into the dawn, decided that his melodies needed a matching culinary symphony. Jack traded his brass stacks for kitchen racks, channeling his improvisational genius into dishes that hit all the right notes. Here, every bite is a crescendo, every sip a soulful solo, making the food at Brass Stack Jack's not just amazing, but a testament to the art of jazz itself. It’s where the smoky flavors of oak-fired grills meet the smoothness of a perfectly aged bourbon, creating a dining experience that’s as legendary as Jack’s midnight serenades. Come for the food, stay for the rhythm, and leave with your soul fed in more ways than one. Brass Stack Jack's – where the jazz is hot, and the food is even hotter.
